Name: Lome
Description: Lome is the capital and largest city of Togo, located along the Gulf of Guinea. It is the country s economic, cultural, and administrative center.

Name: Sokode
Description: Sokode is the second-largest city in Togo, located in the northern part of the country. It is an important center for trade and cultural exchange.

Name: Kara
Description: Kara is a city in the northern part of Togo, known for its historical significance and agricultural activities. It serves as a commercial hub for the region.
